about_the_game:
Leo: The Square is a minimalist 2D platformer that focuses heavily on atmosphere and level design. As players explore various locations, they will encounter diverse challenges, solve puzzles, and interact with unique characters.

Key Features

  • Varied levels: Each level offers a diverse range of challenges and mechanics, designed to captivate players with unique interactions between light and shadow. From navigating through intricate shadow puzzles to uncovering hidden pathways illuminated by light, players will encounter a variety of intriguing scenarios that keep them engaged and eager to explore further.

  • Atmospheric music: The game is complemented by a carefully crafted soundtrack that enhances the overall atmosphere and draws players deeper into Leo's world.

  • Minimalist design: With its minimalist aesthetic, Leo: The Square offers a visually striking experience that leaves a lasting impression. Every aspect of the game's design is meticulously thought out to provide players with a truly unique visual journey.

  • Compelling storyline: Leo: The Square tells a captivating story as players accompany Leo on his thrilling adventure through a world filled with mysteries and secrets. Along the way, players will become emotionally invested in Leo's journey as they uncover the truth behind his quest.

About the developer

My name is Tim, and I'm developing Leo: The Square single-handedly to share my passion for gaming and provide players with an enjoyable experience. My approach to game development priorities delivering something unique and captivating for players to enjoy. I share details and thoughts about development on my YouTube channel, join us!
